demo.description: The starting point for your next project is based on MUI. Easy customization helps you build apps faster and better.

hero.title: Digital World:
hero.description: The infrastructure uniting agroecology and blockchain. Decentralized governance and AI technology for a borderless real-world asset network.

items.question: How can I get updates on the project?
items.answer: You will receive constant updates on the DAO's governance and the progress of RWA tokenization through our official channels on Discord and Telegram.

items.question: What is the role of ASPPIBRA-DAO in agroecology?
items.answer: We work on digitizing processes and traceability for rural producers, such as agroecological coffee farmers in Paraty, ensuring more transparency and product valuation.

items.question: Does the project have legal compliance?
items.answer: Yes, Phase 01 of our roadmap focuses on establishing the legal structure and institutional compliance to ensure the security and legality of all operations.

items.question: How does asset security work?
items.answer: Security is guaranteed through audited smart contracts on the blockchain, which ensure the immutability, transparency, and sovereignty of tokenized asset transactions.
